products.name: CLINICAL PILATES
products.description: Clinical Pilates is a form of physical exercise that focuses on posture, core stability, balance, control, and breathing. The Pilates Method was developed by Joseph Pilates in the early 20th.

products.name: MAT PILATES
products.description: Mat Pilates is based on the original exercises Joseph Pilates developed to strengthen his own body as a very young man and then began teaching others.

products.name: CLASSICAL PILATES
products.description: The Classical Pilates workout includes a mat, reformer, and typically two additional pieces of equipment workout to improve, intensify, and address unique body challenges.

products.name: GROUP REFORMER PILATES
products.description: A reformer is an apparatus designed with a system of springs and pulleys that allows an exercise to become more accessible or more challenging based on the choice of setup
